name: Capcom Fighting Collection
overview: Fighting games Included: - Capcom vs SNK 2 (JP) - Capcom vs SNK 2: Fan Disk (JP) - Ikaruga (JP) - Marvel vs Capcom 2 (US) - Marvel vs Capcom 2 (JP) - Super Street Fighter 2 X (NEW English Translation) - Super Street Fighter 2 X (JP) - Street Fighter 3: 3rd Strike (US) - Street Fighter 3: 3rd Strike (JP) - Super Puzzle Fighter 2 X (NEW English Translation) - Super Puzzle Fighter 2 X (JP)
